name: Millipede With A Chance Of LightBulbs
name_original: Millipede With A Chance Of LightBulbs
description:
Millipede With A chance Of Lightbulbs is an adaption of Atari Millipede in the style of Atsuko Tanaka's work 

Currently In-development

- player respawn 

- circle spawn 

- most assets are currently placeholders 

-mushrooms are invincible should be destroyable
